page.title: 15GOLDEN HINDE,FORT AUGUSTUS.
page.content: In the spring of 1985 a replica of Sir Francis Drake's Golden Hinde passed through Fort Augustus on the { {Caledonian Canal.} Our school was allowed to go on board and a guide took us down below where we saw the huge cogs that turned the sails.We also saw some of the weapons that would have been used in the time of Sir Francis Drake including the huge cannons that would have been used in battle.The size of the cannon balls was about the same size as those used in the game of bowls.We were then shown where they slept.They didn't sleep in ordinary beds,they slept in hammocks. The replica of the {Golden Hinde} looked very realistic and we all found our time aboard her very interesting.
